org.opentcs.util.communication.tcp

Class ByteSequenceDissector<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.communication.tcp.ByteSequenceDissector<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The type of objects created from the byte stream.

    public abstract class ByteSequenceDissector<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes a stream of bytes and constructs objects from it.

        Clears the internal buffer.

      • hasObjects

        public final boolean hasObjects()
        Checks if this dissector has identified/parsed any objects in the byte stream.
        Returns:
        true if, and only if, there are objects in the queue.

      • getNextObject

        public final E getNextObject()
        Returns the next object in the queue (if any).
        Returns:
        The next object in the queue, or null, if this dissector's queue is empty.

      • addObject

        protected final void addObject(E newObject)
        Adds an object to this tokenizer's queue.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The merged data.
